description.en: He is Lu Wu Wei. Seven years ago, he was a nobody. In the midst of family infighting and power struggles, he was framed by traitors, expelled from his family, and stripped of his abilities, earning the nickname “Shame of the Capital.” Seven years passed, and Lu Wu Wei became the most accomplished man alive, invincible in the world. His personal guard, all legendary War Gods, are honored in history as the Da Xue Dragon Cavalry.
description.vi: Hắn là Lục Vô Vi, bảy năm trước hắn chỉ là kẻ tầm thường. Trong cuộc đấu tranh gia tộc, giao tiếp quyền lực, hắn bị kẻ gian hãm hại, bị trục xuất khỏi gia tộc phế bỏ tu vi, mọi người gọi g hắn là "Sự sỉ nhục của kinh thành". Bảy năm thời gian lưu chuyển, Lục Vô Vi trở thành một người hoàn toàn khác. Vô địch tại thế gian, mà thân vệ dưới tay hắn đều là đỉnh phong chiến thần, thành viên đều ghi tên sử sách, được thế nhân gọi là Đại Tuyết Long Kỵ
description.zh: 他是陆无为，七年前的他碌碌无为。家族内斗，权力交接，他遭奸人陷害，被逐出家族废去修为，人们称他“京城之耻”。七年时光流转，陆无为成为最为有为的人。无敌于世间，而他手下的亲卫皆为巅峰战神，成员皆名垂青史，被世人称为大雪龙骑。

altTitles.th: บันทึกตำนานอัศดงคต

description.en: The original journey to the west to retrieve the Sutra was a conspiracy plotted by the Heavens! Just after a few decades, the Sutra has vanished. The Heavens search for the Sutra with plans to use it with corrupted intentions. In order for the Sutra to not fall into the hands of Heaven, the journey to the west will begin once again.

altTitles.ja: ダンダダン

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ja: 幽霊肯定派の女子校生・綾瀬桃と、同級生の怪奇現象オタク・オカルト君。互いに否定するUFOと怪異を信じさせるため、桃はUFOスポットの病院廃墟へ、オカルト君は心霊スポットのトンネルへ行くのだが…。運命の恋が始まる!?
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.uk:
Чорти, чудовиська, позаземці, підлітковий роман, махачі та дідько б їх узяв… раковини! У цій манзі ви знайдете все!

Окультний фанбой Такакура, його подруга Аясе та їх надприродні пригоди у новій психоломній манзі!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

description.en:
“My mother’s killer, the one who scarred my face forever, and even stole my fiancé—Kanna.”  

This time, I’ll take everything back.  

But the idea of rewriting the past was nothing more than my arrogance.  

“No matter how hard you struggle, you’ll never beat me, Linette.”  

A relentless battle begins between two sisters—one who lost everything and another who took it all.

A global anomaly has occurred, and monsters have invaded. Monster trainers now bear the burden of saving human civilization. After Xiao Xingyu crosses over, he awakens the “God-tier Monster Training System”. By opening the Eye of the Demonic God, he can see through all hidden evolution paths of monsters, activate their hidden bloodlines, and unlock infinite evolution… A husky can evolve into the Hellhound! A fairy can mutate into the Twelve-Winged Blazing Angel! Hatching a dragon egg can summon the Nine-Spirited Candle Dragon!”

Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

When the ruthless Lord Tiwakan seizes the kingdom of Nauk, Princess Liene Arsac faces an impossible choice: marry her captor or watch her homeland crumble. But Lord Tiwakan isn’t just after power; he desires Liene, and his devotion stirs a mix of fear and undeniable attraction within her. With her former betrothed, Lafitte, still missing, Liene must decide whether to trust Tiwakan's promises or hold out hope for a rescue. As dangerous secrets come to light, Liene’s decision could change the fate of Nauk—and her own heart—forever.
description.pl: Kiedy bezwzględny lord Tiwakan przejmuje królestwo Nauk, księżniczka Liene Arsac staje przed niemożliwym wyborem: poślubić swojego porywacza lub patrzeć, jak jej ojczyzna się rozpada. Ale lord Tiwakan pragnie nie tylko władzy; pożąda Liene, a jego oddanie wzbudza w niej mieszankę strachu i niezaprzeczalnego przyciągania. Ponieważ jej były narzeczony, Lafitte, wciąż jest uznawany za zaginionego, Liene musi zdecydować, czy zaufać obietnicom Tiwakana, czy też mieć nadzieję na ratunek. Gdy niebezpieczne sekrety wychodzą na jaw, decyzja Liene może zmienić los Nauk - i jej własnego serca - na zawsze.

altTitles.ja: (C93) 最期の蛮餐 (東方project)

title.en: Leveling Up Fast with Divine Measurement Skills

altTitles.ja-ro: Kami Haka Skill de Saisoku Leveling

altTitles.ja: 神測スキルで最速レベリング

description.en: In Japan, where explorers excel at dungeon conquering, Namiki Haruka, who remains weak even at level 100, is ridiculed by society as a premature weakling. However, after his own death triggers a transformation, he acquires the unique skill 'Divine Measurement' and begins to awaken.

altTitles.en: A Former Brave Resident in the Dungeon

altTitles.ja: ダンジョン暮らしの元勇者
ダンジョン暮らしの元勇者 THE COMIC

description.en:
After killing the Demon Lord, Blum Dilmond was pursued by the kingdom and forced to leave the country. While spending days trying to avoid the assassins aiming at his neck, he suddenly came up with an idea. He could hide inside the dungeon that was once the Demon Lord’s hideout. If it’s there, then he could be safe.   
  
Without hesitating Blum went into the dungeon, but then he met someone unexpected in the lower levels, one of his former companions with whom he fought side by side against the Demon Lord. Moreover, a maid, called Irene, who once served the Demon Lord is also there. And so since their interests happened to match, the three of them decided to cooperate together to rebuild the worn-out dungeon, working earnestly in order to turn it into their own safe paradise.

altTitles.th: ปฏิบัติการแปลงโฉมลูกสาวเจ้าพ่อ

description.en: A story about an ordinary boy named Mekh, whose life is about to change the moment he accidentally hit the infamous and easily-misuderstood girl named Saran.

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...

altTitles.vi: Cô bạn cùng lớp lạnh lùng sau ◯◯ năm...

title.en: The Tower Master Who Became the Grand Duchess

description.en: A once content life shatters when Lacia, the 13th Tower Master, awakens in the body of the disgraced Duchess Eckhardt—powerless and trapped in a ruinous fate. Determined to reclaim her lost magic, she devises a bold plan, only to find herself entangled with the mysterious Duke Calix, who hides his true identity. As they navigate deception and unexpected attraction, will Lacia succeed in reclaiming her true self?

Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.ja: 不徳のギルド

description.en:
Kikuru Madan, a monster hunter with excellent performance because of his particular job in the forest, decides to quit his job because he doesn't want to waste his youth. The reason he wants to quit was that one of his friends got married. One day there is a new recruit. Enome the Guild Receptionist asks him to accompany Hitamuki Kyan the Lolipai Martial Artist to watch her back and teach her how to work. He accepts the request, half because he was worried about her and half because he wanted her to become his successor before he retires completely. Sadly, his plan to retire is derailed by Hitamuki being useless and always attracting some monster. Can Kikuru Madan retire peacefully, despite being saddled with a useless newbie?  
  
Hunting erotic commentary enthusiastically!
description.ja: へっぽこ武道家、つんけん白魔、ものぐさ黒魔、酔いどれ戦士、４人の新米ガード達は街の平和を守るため、魔物に立ち向かうが、ことごとく凌辱を受けることに…
description.es-la: Las cuatro guardias novatas -una artista marcial cabeza hueca, un demonio blanco pellizcado, un demonio negro perezoso y una guerrera borracha- se enfrentan a los demonios para proteger la paz de la ciudad, pero son humilladas a cada paso...

title.en: Intai Shita Ossan Kenja da ga Manadeshi ga Tsuihou Sarete Kita no de Shoushin Ryokou ni Tsureteiku ~Slow Life na Tabi no Tsumori ga, Nazeka Sekai Saikyou no Shitei ni Natteita~

altTitles.ja: 引退したおっさん賢者だが愛弟子が追放されてきたので傷心旅行に連れて行く ～スローライフな旅のつもりが、なぜか世界最強の師弟になっていた〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Intaishita Ossan Kenjada ga Manadeshi ga Tsuihou Sarete Kita no de Shoushin Ryokou ni Tsureteiku ~Surouraifu na Tabi no Tsumori ga, Nazeka Sekai Saikyou no Shitei ni Natte Ita~

altTitles.en: A Retired Old Sage Takes His Disciple on a Journey

He Is a Retired Old Sage, but His Beloved Disciple Has Been Expelled, So He Takes Her on a Heartbreak Trip ~He Intended to Travel in a Slow Life Fashion, but for Some Reason He Ended Up Becoming the World's Strongest Master and Disciple.~

altTitles.id: Seorang Sage Tua Yang Sudah Pensiun Mengajak Muridnya Dalam Sebuah Perjalanan

description.en:
"Shall we go on an adventure, like in the old days?"

Although he was an orphan, Roge trained hard and became known as the “Sage.” His beloved student, Liliane, suddenly came to visit him. 

"Roge-sensei… I… have been expelled." 

Liliane has been employed as a royal court mage, but after being exhausted by the harsh working environment and shady human relationships, she was fired without being told why. In an attempt to heal her exhausted heart, Roge invites her on an adventure to relieve her heartbreak. 

"Sensei, I want to travel with you, to relive those bright days once again!" 

And so begins a slow-pace journey, following the paths they once travelled together, but the two, who are both too talented for their own good, end up leaving legends behind in every place they went…

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

title.en: Progolfer no Ore ga Imouto no Putter ni Tensei Shiteshimatta Ken

altTitles.ja: プロゴルファーの俺が妹のパターに転生してしまった件

altTitles.en: The Case of Me, a Pro Golfer, Being Reincarnated as My Little Sister's Putter

altTitles.zh-hk: 本是職業高爾夫選手的我轉生成妹妹的推桿

description.en:
On the green of the All Japan Open final, professional golfer Kazuma Yagami is killed by a lightning strike just before he is about to win! His soul, unable to leave his sister behind, resides in the putter he was carrying at the time, and his younger sister, Ryoko, who inherited the putter, decides to win the tour championship using only her brother's putter!


In order to become a professional golfer, Ryoko enrolls in the prestigious Seven Two Academy, where the elite golfers gather. The challenge of the two of them together is about to begin. ----!
description.ja: 兄の遺志を受け継ぎ、パター１本でのツアー優勝を目指す女子校生・火神リョーコ！ゴルフの名門・私立七十二学園に入学し、並み居るライバルとの決闘【デュエル】に挑む―――！！

altTitles.ja: はじめてのお嬢様

altTitles.es-la: La dama de las primeras veces

altTitles.vi: Trải nghiệm lần đầu của Tiểu Thư

description.en: Ojou Kotone is a first-year high school girl who was having trouble using the ticket machine at the station, Suguru Sewa, a first-year high school boy passing by helped her out, and he surprised as she transferred to Sewa's high school. It's her first time to taking the train, her first trying curry udon, Sewa being her first friend. This is a love comedy of firsts between a young lady and a caring high school boy!
description.ja: 御城琴音は超がつくお嬢様の高校１年生。駅の券売機の使い方が分からず困っているところを通りがかりの高校１年生・瀬和すぐるに助けられたのをきっかけに、瀬和の高校に転校してきた。はじめての電車。はじめてのカレーうどん。はじめての友達。「はじめてを教えて欲しい」お嬢様と世話焼き男子高校生のはじめてラブコメディ！
description.es-la: Ojou Kotone es una chica de primero de bachillerato que tenía problemas para usar la máquina expendedora de billetes de la estación, Suguru Sewa, un chico de primero de bachillerato que pasaba por allí la ayudó, y él se sorprendió ya que ella se cambió al instituto de Sewa. Es la primera vez que coge el tren, la primera vez que prueba el curry udon, y Sewa es su primer amigo. Se trata de una comedia de amor entre una joven y un cariñoso chico de instituto.

title.en: There's a Rat in Our House

altTitles.en: There Is a Mouse in My House
There's a Mouse in my House

description.en: Amidst the freezing winter, a solitary being huddled on the snow-covered pavement, bearing the burden of deep loneliness and faded scars. It had forsaken itself, fragile and vulnerable. The reason for welcoming this nameless creature into the home was straightforward. "What... does this mean?" "You helped me, and I wish to return the favor." In the complete darkness where no trace of light could penetrate, only two warm bodies occupied the space

title.en: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンクエスト ダイの大冒険 勇者アバンと獄炎の魔王

altTitles.ja-ro: Dragon Quest: Dai no Daibouken - Yuusha Avan to Gokuen no Maou

altTitles.ar: مهمة التنين: مغامة داي الكبرى: البطل افان و جحيم ملك الشياطين المستعر

altTitles.vi: Dragon Quest: Dũng giả Avan và Ngục viêm Ma vương

description.en: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan! Another heroic story begins now!

title.en: Should I Make You a Nuclear Weapon?

altTitles.en: I Make Nuclear Weapons for You?

description.en:
Director Kim Jun of the Defense Science Research Institute faces a tragic end while protecting the ADD chip, a military secret of South Korea, during a terrorist attack in 2024.

However, he suddenly finds himself with an unexpected opportunity: he is reborn in the body of his friend Jeon Hyun-seung, who died in 1998!

Revived as Kim Jun, he discovers that he can access future technologies using the ADD chip engraved in his body.

"If you give me the chance... I’ll show you what I can create within three months."

Create the ultimate weapon to overcome the IMF crisis with future technology! Let me know if you need anything else!

title.en: Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?

altTitles.id: Aku, Seorang Raja Iblis, Mengambil Budak Elf Sebagai Istriku, Tapi Bagaimana Cara Aku Mencintainya?

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?

altTitles.pt: Eu, um Lorde Demônio, comprei uma elfa escrava como minha esposa, mas como eu amo ela?

altTitles.en: I, the Demon Lord, Took a Slave Elf as My Wife, but How Do I Love Her?

altTitles.fr: Je, un seigneur des démons, ai épousé un elfe esclavagisant, mais comment l'aime-je?

altTitles.ru: Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку в жёны. И как прикажете её любить?
Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку-рабыню в жёны. И как же мне её любить?

altTitles.zh: 我这魔王娶了一个奴隶精灵当老婆，该怎么疼爱才好？

altTitles.zh-hk: 身為魔王的我娶了奴隸精靈為妻、該如何表白我的愛？

altTitles.ja: 魔王の俺が奴隷エルフを嫁にしたんだが、どう愛でればいい？

altTitles.ko: 마왕인 내가 노예 엘프를 신부로 삼았는데 어떻게 사랑하면 되지?

altTitles.pt-br: O dilema de um arquidemônio: como amar sua noiva elfa

altTitles.es: Soy un rey demonio y he tomado como esposa a una elfa esclava, ¿cómo puedo amarla?

altTitles.es-la: Soy un rey demonio y he tomado como esposa a una elfa esclava, ¿cómo puedo amarla?

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.es: Zagan es temido como un mago malvado, es torpe y tiene una lengua afilada, y una vez más tuvo que acabar con unos ladrones que invadieron su territorio cuando estaba investigando esa mañana. En una oscura subasta, encuentra a una esclava elfa blanca, Nephie, que posee una belleza sin igual. Enamorado de ella a primera vista, utiliza su fortuna para comprarla, pero tan pobre como es socialmente, no entiende cómo relacionarse con ella. Así comienza la torpe convivencia del mago que no sabe transmitir su amor y la esclava que suspira por su amo pero no sabe cómo planteárselo.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.
description.es-la: Zagan es temido como un mago malvado, es torpe y tiene una lengua afilada, y una vez más tuvo que acabar con unos ladrones que invadieron su territorio cuando estaba investigando esa mañana. En una oscura subasta, encuentra a una esclava elfa blanca, Nephie, que posee una belleza sin igual. Enamorado de ella a primera vista, utiliza su fortuna para comprarla, pero tan pobre como es socialmente, no entiende cómo relacionarse con ella. Así comienza la torpe convivencia del mago que no sabe transmitir su amor y la esclava que suspira por su amo pero no sabe cómo planteárselo.
description.pt-br: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.

altTitles.ja: S渡さんとM村くん

description.en: Intelligent and beautiful female high schooler Reika Sawatari and handsome and astute male high schooler Subaru Emura, both of whom with a certain fetish that nobody knows, have started their relationship after a certain event.

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢EPISODE.Gレクイエム

description.en: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack, it is up to Seiya, the last Saint standing, to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.

title.en: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.ja: 与えられたスキルを使って稼いで異世界美女達とイチャイチャしたい

altTitles.id: Aku Ingin Menggunakan Keterampilan Yang Diberikan Untuk Mendapatkan Uang Dan Menggoda Wanita Cantik Dari Dunia Lain

altTitles.ja-ro: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.en: I Want to Use the Skills Given to Earn Money and Flirt With Beauties From Other World

altTitles.pt-br: Quero usar as habilidade que me foi dado para ganhar dinheiro e flertar com lindas mulheres de outro mundo.

description.en: That day, Ishida Yamada was working his part-time job as usual. After finishing his shift, he opened the back door and stepped into a vast, empty space, where he encountered a mysterious figure claiming to be God. By sheer chance, Ishida was chosen by this God to be transported to another world. Although confused and uncertain, he resolved to adapt and make a life for himself in this strange new place. Using the skills granted by God, he focused on surviving and thriving. As he explored different lands and encountered various races, he made it his mission to form close relationships with many beautiful women along the way.
description.ja: その日も山田一太はいつもと変わらずバイトをしていた。バイトが終わり裏口の扉を開けると、そこには真っ白な空間が広がっていて、神と名乗る者がいた。 一太は偶然神によって選ばれ、異世界に行くことになった。一太は戸惑いながらも、取り合えず生きていこうと決めた。 神からもらったスキルを使って如何にこの異世界を生き抜くか考えながら、一太はこの異世界にいる美女と肉体関係を持つために色々と頑張っていく。
description.es-la: Ese día, Ichita Yamada estaba trabajando medio tiempo como de costumbre. Cuando abrió la puerta trasera después de terminar su trabajo de medio tiempo, encontró un espacio en blanco y una persona que se hacía llamar Dios. Fue por casualidad que Dios lo eligió para ir a otro mundo. Estaba perplejo, pero decidió vivir de todos modos. Pensando en cómo sobrevivir en este otro mundo usando las habilidades que recibió de Dios, hace todo lo posible por tener una relación física con una mujer hermosa en este otro mundo.
description.pt-br: Naquele dia, Ishida Yamada estava trabalhando meio período, como sempre. Ao abrir a porta dos fundos após terminar seu trabalho de meio período, ele encontrou um espaço em branco e uma pessoa que se autodenominava Deus. Foi por acaso que ele foi escolhido por Deus para ir para outro mundo. Ele ficou perplexo, mas decidiu viver mesmo assim. Pensando em como sobreviver neste outro mundo usando as habilidades que recebeu de Deus, ele tenta ao máximo ter um relacionamento físico com uma linda mulher neste outro mundo.

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

altTitles.ja: ちるらん 新撰組鎮魂歌【レクイエム】

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
description.pt-br: Em 1912, uma jovem mulher rastreia o idoso Nagakura Shinpachi, determinada a ouvir a verdadeira história do Demônio do Shinsengumi, o Vice-Comandante Hijikata Toshizou. A história de Hijikata começa em 1859, quando ele é um jovem violento que está aprimorando suas habilidades com a espada enquanto vende os remédios de sua família. Logo, em sua busca para encontrar pessoas mais fortes para lutar, Hijikata começa a entrar em contato com outros que eventualmente se tornarão seus companheiros no Shinsengumi. O primeiro a causar uma impressão no jovem impetuoso é Kondo Isami, que prova ser um lutador melhor do que Hijikata.

altTitles.ja: 1回キスすると10秒間キスできなくなるゲーム

description.en:
300 years ago, the invincible warrior Hyeon-oh Kim brought down the Tower of the End, preventing the world’s demise. Though he should have died the moment the Tower of the End collapsed, Hyeon-oh is reborn 300 years later in the body of a 17-year-old boy named Juhyeok Kim.

Meanwhile, he discovers the existence of the Constellations, who were once his disciples 300 years ago but were born during the time when he did not exist in this world. Will he be able to find them again and train them?

A story that picks up after the first story ends. It tells the tale of the 3rd Universe's Gasai Yuno after her encounter with the Yukiteru and Yuno of the other universes. Her life seems normal, but something feels like it is missing. She can't help being fascinated with the boy in her grade, Amano Yukiteru, because he keeps appearing in her dreams…

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: テンカイチ -日本最強武芸者決定戦-

altTitles.en: Tenkaichi: The Greatest Warrior Under the Rising Sun
Tenkaichi: Battle to Decide Japan's Strongest Martial Artist
First Under Heaven: The Battles To Decide Japan's Strongest Martial Artist

altTitles.zh: 天下第一 日本最強武士選拔賽
天下第一 日本最强武士选拔赛

altTitles.pt-br: Tenkaichi - A Batalha para decidir o Artista Marcial mais forte do Japão

altTitles.es: Tenkaichi - El luchador de artes marciales más fuerte de Japón.

altTitles.es-la: Tenkaichi - El luchador de artes marciales más fuerte de Japón.

altTitles.vi: Tenkaichi - Thiên Hạ Đệ Nhất Võ Sĩ Đại Hội

description.en:
Battle tournament manga set in the Sengoku Era. The year is 1600. Ten years have passed since Oda Nobunaga unified Japan. When Nobunaga realized that he was dying, he announced that he would hand over the country to the one who produced the strongest warriors. The warlords, whose dreams of unifying the country had been dashed, set up their own strongest warriors and set their sights on becoming the ruler of Japan.
___
**Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10585/episode/356567) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.
description.ja: 時は西暦1600年。“織田信長”が全国統一してから10年が経過していた――。信長は自分の死期を悟ると、最強の武芸者を輩出したものに“この国”を譲ると発表。天下統一の夢破れた武将たちは、それぞれ最強の武芸者を擁立し、この国の王を目指す！
description.vi:
Một câu chuyện với một chuỗi lịch sử hoàn toàn lạ lẫm với lịch sử mà chúng ta đã và đang từng được biết.
Oda Nobugana, sau khi hoàn thành đại nghiệp thống nhất thiên hạ, nay chỉ vì muốn nhìn thấy cảnh chém giết đổ máu, đã lập nên một giải đấu nhằm chọn ra người sẽ thay mình trị vì cả thiên hạ, "TENKAICHI". Để tham gia, những văn võ bá quan lẫn các trung thần đều sẽ chọn ra cho mình một võ sĩ đại diện, người mà họ cho rằng sẽ là thiên hạ đệ nhất võ sĩ tham gia thi đấu cho mình. Một đại hội đẫm máu và tàn khốc chưa từng có trong lịch sử Nhật Bản chính thức bắt đầu.
description.es-la: Torneo de batalla ambientado en la Era Sengoku. Es el año 1600. Han pasado diez años desde que Oda Nobunaga unificó Japón. Cuando Nobunaga se dio cuenta de que se estaba muriendo, anunció que entregaría el país a quien produjera los guerreros más fuertes. Los señores de la guerra, cuyos sueños de unificar el país se habían visto frustrados, crearon sus propios guerreros más fuertes y pusieron sus miras en convertirse en el gobernante de Japón
description.pt-br: “Quem é o artista marcial mais forte do Japão?” É 1600 D.C., dez anos se passaram desde que "Oda Nobunaga" unificou todo o país. Percebendo sua morte, Nobunaga anuncia que entregará 'este país' àquele que tivesse como seguidor o artista marcial mais forte.

title.en: Dogs and the Brave Are Not Showy

altTitles.ja: 犬と勇者は飾らない

altTitles.en: Dogs and Heroes Don't Dress Up

description.en: Summoned to another world to defeat the demon king, Satou Sousuke, 18 years old and only finished elementary school, is brought back to his world after several years had passed. While unable to find employment anywhere and living off a part-time job, Sousuke encounters a battle between a magician and a demon he thought didn’t exist on earth! He easily defeated the demon, so being marked for his power he’s involved in Demon subjugation?!

altTitles.ja: 恋愛の授業

description.en: In 20XX, the Love Education Law was enacted. "Love" has become a mandatory subject in a response to the declining birthrate. Michitaka Sato, a high school student who has given up on romance and works hard on his studies, is on the verge of failing school. When he attends a supplementary class to avoid repeating a grade, Mai Aihara, a beautiful girl who is a problem child, appears as his partner...? Suddenly, he begins to study love alone with the beautiful girl in the three C's. Close contact, close quarters, and behind closed doors! Does Aihara-san have a secret...?
description.ja: 20××年、少子化対策として「恋愛」が必修科目となった。男子高校生・秦野満月は奥手ゆえに落第寸前に陥り、恋愛落第生となった幼なじみ・可愛川茜と恋愛の補習を受けることに…!?
description.vi: Vào năm 20XX, Luật Giáo dục Tình yêu đã được ban hành. \"Tình yêu\" đã trở thành một chủ đề bắt buộc để đối phó với tỷ lệ sinh giảm.Tahano Mitsuki, một học sinh trung học đã từ bỏ sự lãng mạn và chăm chỉ học tập, đang trên bờ vực thất bại ở trường. Khi anh ấy tham gia một lớp học bổ sung để tránh học lại lớp, Mai Aihara, một cô gái xinh đẹp là một đứa trẻ có vấn đề, xuất hiện như là đối tác của anh ấy...? Đột nhiên, anh bắt đầu nghiên cứu tình yêu một mình với cô gái xinh đẹp trong ba C. Tiếp xúc gần, khu vực gần gũi và sau cánh cửa đóng kín! Aihara-san có bí mật gì không...? Một bộ phim hài lãng mạn học hỏi tình yêu giữa một cô gái JK xinh đẹp và một chàng trai.

title.en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~

altTitles.ja: めざせ豪華客船!!　～船召喚スキルで異世界リッチライフを手に入れろ～

altTitles.ko: 노려라 호화객선!! 배 소환 스킬로 이세계 부자 라이프를 손에 넣어라

altTitles.en: Aim for a luxury cruise ship!! ~Obtain a rich life in another world with a ship summoning skill~

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

altTitles.ja: おさななじみの百合

title.en: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!

altTitles.ja: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！

altTitles.en: Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！

altTitles.vi: Drawing: Mangaka Mạnh Nhất Với Kỹ Năng Vẽ Tranh Vô Song Tại Dị Giới

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.ja: 漫画家として大成功を収めていた神代彰は、成功だけに囚われて人間関係を蔑ろにし続けた自分の人生を後悔しながら死んでしまう。そんな彰を待っていたのは、自分で母親を選んで異世界転生するチャンス！？転生した彰は剣術も魔法もダメダメだったが、家族に愛されながら平穏な生活を送っていた。しかしあるとき、「絵を描く」ことでいろいろなものを具現化できるチート能力に気がついてしまって……？
description.vi: Akira, một họa sĩ tài năng nhưng sau khi bị bệnh ung thư anh đã nhận ra xung quanh mình chẳng còn gì ngoại trừ cái danh hiệu "thành công" của mình. Không có người đi cùng mình đến bệnh viện, người mẹ, người thân duy nhất của anh cũng đòi anh đưa tiền mới chịu đi cùng anh. Trong cơn giận anh đã vô tình gây tai nạn và được chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác. Một thế giới mới với một cuộc sống mới anh quyết định sống một cách bình thường và giữ gìn hạnh phúc gia đình nhỏ nhoi của mình
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

title.en: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukaima wa Osananajimi

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの最強テイマー、使い魔は幼馴染

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukai ma wa Osananajimi

altTitles.en: The Strongest Tamer Returned From Another World With His Childhood Friend as His Familiar

altTitles.id: Penjinak Terkuat Kembali Dari Dunia Lain Dengan Teman Masa Kecilnya sebagai Familiarnya

description.en:
“But I’m powerless without you, my Master.”

After being suddenly summoned to another world and saving that world from a crisis, high school students Wataru and Rumi have safely made it back to the real world. But the real world has been completely transformed! Dungeons are popping up and people have awakened their skills… It’s as if the real world is turning into the world they just left behind…

A dungeon fantasy story where the returnees from another world, the tamer Wataru and his familiar Rumi, mow down everything in their way as the strongest combination that is closer than childhood friends but not quite lovers!
description.ja: 「でも私、ご主人様の渉（わたる）がいないと何もできないよ？」　異世界に突然召喚され、危機を救った高校生の渉と瑠美は、無事に現実世界へと帰還した。しかし、戻ってきたはずの現実世界は様変わりしていて、ダンジョンが発生し、人類はスキルに目覚め、まるで異世界と同じような世界になっていて…　異世界帰りのテイマー・渉と、その使い魔・瑠美。幼馴染以上恋人未満の最強コンビが無双するダンジョンファンタジー

description.en: Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the “strongest demon” power hidden inside him. “The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: “Don’t let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!
description.pt-br: À beira da morte, o guerreiro mais forte da humanidade, Ang, misteriosamente reencarna sessenta anos no futuro com a força do “Demônio mais Forte” — uma espada perigosa de dois gumes. Para resolver suas queixas e revelar a verdade, Ang não tem escolha a não ser “evoluir” continuamente em uma tentativa de fuga de seu destino passado. “Não vou deixar que eu me torne um demônio! Se quero sair, preciso confiar em mim mesmo!”

title.en: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything

altTitles.en: I Don't Want To Do Anything

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)
description.ko:
26살의 봄, 오늘부터 아무것도 하지 않기로 결심했다

엄마가 그랬다. 
손해 보고 사는 게 편하다고.

엄마 말이 맞다.
그래, 손해 보고 살자.

단, 호구 잡히지 않을 정도만.

이여름, 26세 봄
오늘 회사를 그만뒀다.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)

altTitles.ja: ロックオン

description.pt-br: Dragon Ball: New Hope é um fan-mangá que conta uma história alternativa da saga cell, onde Gohan é derrotado pelo vilão.

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

title.en: Sekai wo Teki ni Mawashitemo Neko wo Aishiteru

altTitles.ja: 世界を敵に回してもねこを愛してる

altTitles.en: I'll Always Love Cats, Even if it Turns the World Against Me

description.en: A comic essay about the author's love for cats and her daily life with her 3 cats.

title.en: It's Not My Fault for Being Delicious

altTitles.zh-ro: Meiwei you bushi wo de cuo

description.en: Bai Qian Qian, a human, fell into the demon world and became an ingredient! Now the handsome looking demons want to eat her!!! QAQ In order to survive, she signed a contract with the bamboo demon Xia Zhu and became his main ingredient... Wait, something's not right. Shit, is this what love feels like?
description.zh: 漫画简介: 人类少女白茜茜，误入妖界秒变食材！妖怪都是帅哥，各个都想吃掉她QAQ?为生存她与竹妖夏竹缔结契约，成为他的专属食材……等等，似乎有什么不对？糟糕，好像是心动的感觉！

altTitles.ja: ホーリーナイト

description.en: Mizumura Shinta didn’t know what to make of the situation when the sexiest girl in school, Kishimoto Ririsu, starts seducing him and things get extremely physical. Shinta isn’t rich or the popular guy in school so it doesn’t make sense that Ririsu would be so interested in him. But Ririsu is in fact a vampire, a secret that she will kill to keep hidden. As the relationship between Shinta and Ririsu grows, it gets harder for her to keep the secret hidden. And when those close to him, like his semi-romantic childhood friend Makimura Chizuru, are involuntarily thrown into the chaos, deep dark secrets get revealed.
description.ja: 「中出しのセッ●スって…超気持ちイイんだよ？」童貞の俺がハーフの女の子から、いきなり中出しを強要され!?　東京の某ミッション系短大に通う主人公の心太は、平穏且つ平凡な毎日を過ごしていた。そんなある日、学園に転入してきた謎のハーフ美少女リリスとの出会いにより彼の生活は大きく変化する…。理由もわからぬまま、突然リリスから濃厚なキスをされ、熱くなった股間を強く上下に動かされ…。「私が妊娠しちゃうくらい…キミの精子、たっぷり注ぎ込んで…？」心太を誘惑するリリスの本当の思惑とは…。
